name: Awakened
description: You have awakened to the dark realities of psychic phenomena and to the invisible forces that stream through the cosmos.

name: Fearless
description: You fear nothing, at least from planet Earth.  You are also somewhat resistant to cosmic horrors and fear-based psychic attacks.  However, this also prevents you from ever gaining psychic powers.

name: Willpower
description: You have an indomitable will, and are resistant to psychic attacks.  However, this also prevents you from ever gaining psychic powers.

name: Fear Resistant
description: You have evolved past your primitive fight-or-flight instincts.  Penalties for fear are reduced.

name: Mesmerist
description: Through strength of personality, you can persuade and entrance the weak willed.

name: Psychic Defense
description: Your overly sensitive mind has adapted to constant psychic stress.  You can now actively defend yourself against fear and psychic onslaughts.

name: Psychic Projection
description: Your expanding mind has begun to reach beyond the borders of your physical self.  You can now materialize objects and infuse them with your power.

spawn_item.message: You concentrate your psychic energies into material form

name: Psychic Strength
description: Your growing consciousness has subsumed portions of your autonomous nervous system.  You have gained the power to temporarily overcome physical limits.

name: Enthralled
description: This person has been overcome by your mesmeric powers.

name: Unthrall
description: This person is now immune to enthralling.

name: Lobotomized
description: Either through surgery or purely psychic means, you have had your psychic powers removed.
